name: Magia Tower
description:
What is "Magia Tower"?

Magia Tower is a top-down tower defence game in which you defend your magic box from a horde of incoming creatures. Sharpen your sword and plan your strategy as you try to survive in a magical land.

Mechanics
  • Attack: Attack enemy creatures, lonely trees and solid rocks. Everything you see, you can attack!
  • Build: Gather wood & stone to build powerful magical turrets that will defend your base when you're not around!
  • Enchant: Enchant towers that are in the range of your magic box and tap into their true power!
Please rate and comment to leave us feedback! We're keen on improving this project :3
